Commands.Snatch: Adds target's BRV to Yuffie's BRV before inflicting a BRV attack.  Steals a random buff from the target.
Commands.I don't need this: Transfers all of Yuffie's debuffs to the target without fail.  Extends transferred debuffs' duration by 1 turn.  Grants "Now it's perfect!" for 4 turns.  "Now it's perfect!" raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack that raises all party members' BRV based on Yuffie's Max BRV.

Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Snatch BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Snatch.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.I don't need this BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using I don't need this.
Passives.Snatch Charge: Increases the max uses of Snatch by 1.
Passives.I don't need this Charge: Increases the max uses of I don't need this by 1.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self.
Passives.Materia Hunter: Slightly raises Speed for 2 turns and grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Speed Down debuff for 2 turns, after a BRV Attack.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Snatch Extend: Increases Snatch's max uses by 1.Lowers target's BRV by 1/2 when Snatch is used.Increase its number of hits to 2.Tremendously raises its total potency.Triggers an HP attack if BRV is over 80% Max BRV.
Passives.Buff Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.I don't need this Extend: Increases the max uses of I don't need this by 1.Inflicts Small Initial BRV Down, Small Max BRV Down, Small Attack Down and Small Defense Down for 3 turns before applying reflected debuffs.Raises party's BRV based on Max BRV.Dispels 1 debuff for all allies except self.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ while "Now it's perfect" is active.HP Attack+ raises BRV based on Max BRV before the HP attack.

Weapons.Oritsuru CP: 15: Grants Small Max BRV Up for 1 turn.
Weapons.Wind Slash CP: 35: Increases the max uses of I don't need this by 1.Makes the debuff throwback affect all enemies.Extends all thrown debuffs' duration by 5 turns.Improves the effects of "Now it's perfect!" and extends its duration to 8 turns.Raises BRV based on Max BRV.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while "Now it's perfect!" is active.
